  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/799</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/799</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Aquest any, física: El globus que es punxa i no esclata</string>
            <string language="en">The unburstable balloon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der unburstable Ballon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le ballon unburstable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O balão unburstable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aerostato unburstable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το unburstable μπαλόνι</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Fitxa de la col.lecció "Aquest any, física!" que presenta un experiment sobre l'elasticitat dels materials anomenats elastòmers.
La fitxa conté un vídeo, una imatge, el guió de la pràctica i qüestions amb resposta sobre l'experiment.</string>
            <string language="en">One of the activity cards in the collection "This year, Physics!" This one is an experiment on the elasticity of materials called elastomers. The card includes a video, an image, instructions for the experiment and questions and answers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">química aplicada</string>
            <string language="en">applied chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">química aplicada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">química</string>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">química orgànica</string>
            <string language="en">organic chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">química orgánica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine der Aktivität Karten in der Ansammlung 
"dieses Jahr, Physik!" Dieses ist ein Experiment auf der 
Elastizität der Materialien, die Elastomere genannt werden. Die
Karte schließt einen Bildschirm, ein Bild, Anweisungen für das 
Experiment und Fragen und Antworten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une des cartes d'activité dans la collection 
"cette année, physique!" Celui-ci est une expérience sur 
l'élasticité des matériaux appelés les élastomères. La 
carte inclut un vidéo, une image, des instructions pour l'expérience
et des questions et des réponses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um dos cartões da atividade na coleção "este 
ano, física!" Este é uma experiência na elasticidade dos 
materiais chamados elastomers. O cartão inclui um vídeo, uma 
imagem, instruções para a experiência e perguntas e respostas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una delle schedi di attività nell'accumulazione 
"questo anno, fisica!" Questo è un esperimento sull'elasticità
dei materiali chiamati elastomeri. La scheda include un video, 
un'immagine, istruzioni per l'esperimento e domande e risposte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια από τις κάρτες δραστηριότητας στη συλλογή "αυτό 
το έτος, φυσική!" Αυτό είναι ένα πείραμα στην 
ελαστικότητα των υλικών αποκαλούμενων ελαστομερή. Η κάρτα 
περιλαμβάνει ένα βίντεο, μια εικόνα, τις οδηγίες για το πείραμα 
και τις ερωταποκρίσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">angewandte Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">organische Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chimie appliquée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chimie organique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chemistry aplicado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chemistry orgânico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chimica applicata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
